AbortIncompleteMultipartUpload.description: Specifies the days since the initiation of an incomplete multipart upload that Amazon S3Outposts will wait before permanently removing all parts of the upload.

properties.name: DaysAfterInitiation
properties.description: Specifies the number of days after which Amazon S3Outposts aborts an incomplete multipart upload.

type.description: Specifies the number of days after which Amazon S3Outposts aborts an incomplete multipart upload.

properties.name: Prefix
properties.description: Prefix identifies one or more objects to which the rule applies.

type.description: Prefix identifies one or more objects to which the rule applies.

properties.name: Tags
properties.description: All of these tags must exist in the object's tag set in order for the rule to apply.

type.description: All of these tags must exist in the object's tag set in order for the rule to apply.

FilterPrefix.description: Prefix identifies one or more objects to which the rule applies.

FilterTag.description: Tag used to identify a subset of objects for an Amazon S3Outposts bucket.

properties.name: Rules
properties.description: A list of lifecycle rules for individual objects in an Amazon S3Outposts bucket.

type.description: A list of lifecycle rules for individual objects in an Amazon S3Outposts bucket.

Rule.description: Specifies lifecycle rules for an Amazon S3Outposts bucket. You must specify at least one of the following: AbortIncompleteMultipartUpload, ExpirationDate, ExpirationInDays.

properties.name: AbortIncompleteMultipartUpload
properties.description: Specifies a lifecycle rule that stops incomplete multipart uploads to an Amazon S3Outposts bucket.

type.description: Specifies a lifecycle rule that stops incomplete multipart uploads to an Amazon S3Outposts bucket.

properties.name: ExpirationDate
properties.description: Indicates when objects are deleted from Amazon S3Outposts. The date value must be in ISO 8601 format. The time is always midnight UTC.

type.description: Indicates when objects are deleted from Amazon S3Outposts. The date value must be in ISO 8601 format. The time is always midnight UTC.

properties.name: ExpirationInDays
properties.description: Indicates the number of days after creation when objects are deleted from Amazon S3Outposts.

type.description: Indicates the number of days after creation when objects are deleted from Amazon S3Outposts.

properties.name: Filter
properties.description: The container for the filter of the lifecycle rule.

type.description: The container for the filter of the lifecycle rule.

properties.name: AndOperator
properties.description: The container for the AND condition for the lifecycle rule. A combination of Prefix and 1 or more Tags OR a minimum of 2 or more tags.

type.description: The container for the AND condition for the lifecycle rule. A combination of Prefix and 1 or more Tags OR a minimum of 2 or more tags.

properties.name: Prefix
properties.description: Object key prefix that identifies one or more objects to which this rule applies.

type.description: Object key prefix that identifies one or more objects to which this rule applies.

properties.name: Tag
properties.description: Specifies a tag used to identify a subset of objects for an Amazon S3Outposts bucket.

type.description: Specifies a tag used to identify a subset of objects for an Amazon S3Outposts bucket.

properties.name: Id
properties.description: Unique identifier for the lifecycle rule. The value can't be longer than 255 characters.

type.description: Unique identifier for the lifecycle rule. The value can't be longer than 255 characters.

iso8601UTC.description: The date value in ISO 8601 format. The timezone is always UTC. (YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ssZ)

properties.name: LifecycleConfiguration
properties.description: Rules that define how Amazon S3Outposts manages objects during their lifetime.

type.description: Rules that define how Amazon S3Outposts manages objects during their lifetime.

properties.name: OutpostId
properties.description: The id of the customer outpost on which the bucket resides.

type.description: The id of the customer outpost on which the bucket resides.

properties.name: Tags
properties.description: An arbitrary set of tags (key-value pairs) for this S3Outposts bucket.

type.description: An arbitrary set of tags (key-value pairs) for this S3Outposts bucket.

properties.name: Arn
properties.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the specified bucket.

type.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the specified bucket.
